div.div: April is Child Abuse Prevention Month

div.p: DCS Supports April as Child Abuse Prevention and Awareness Month. Please download and color this pinwheel. Tweet a picture of your decorated pinwheel to @CTF_Michigan for a chance to win $100.

div.div: April is Child Abuse Prevention Month

div.p: Dundee Community Schools is a proud supporter of child abuse prevention. Check out the flyer to see ways you can make #GREATCHILDHOODS happen--especially now.

div.a: See Child Abuse Prevention Month Activities
